oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Brother Luke Grande Solicits Money for the Library Fund
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Libraries; Correspondence; Fund raising
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: President Brother Luke M. Grande addressed Christian Brothers College alumni, asking for support in funding the construction of a new library. At this time, the campus library was located on the ground floor of the Administration Building. The new library would be the first free-standing library at CBC.

Any image from the library's collection must cite as the source: Brother I. Leo O'Donnell Archives, Plough Library, Christian Brothers University. For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
